column2:
xset <- xcmsSet( 
  method = "centWave",
  peakwidth       = c(21.48, 90),
  ppm             = 13.25,
  noise           = 5000,
  snthresh        = 10,
  mzdiff          = -0.000449999999999999,
  prefilter       = c(3, 100),
  mzCenterFun     = "wMean",
  integrate       = 1,
  fitgauss        = FALSE,
  verbose.columns = FALSE)

xset <- retcor( 
  xset,
  method         = "obiwarp",
  plottype       = "none",
  distFunc       = "cor_opt",
  profStep       = 1,
  center         = 2,
  response       = 1,
  gapInit        = 0.64,
  gapExtend      = 2.7,
  factorDiag     = 2,
  factorGap      = 1,
  localAlignment = 0)

xset <- group( 
  xset,
  method  = "density",
  bw      = 0.879999999999999,
  mzwid   = 0.0265,
  minfrac = 1,
  minsamp = 1,
  max     = 50)
